QuestData.Title: Victory From Within
QuestData.Description: A few of our men didn't make it through portals which were supposed to open inside this very abbey. You've already proven your elusiveness and battlehardiness... now I need you to do so again.$b$bThe abbey has two wings: a library, and a hall of arms. In each wing, you should find a portal.$b$bUse this keystone on these portals. Doing so should force them open, allowing our remaining shock troopers to take this abbey.
QuestData.LogDescription: Open the Argent Portals in the Library Wing and the Hall of Arms within the abbey in Tyr's Hand.
QuestData.CompletionText: One hundred soldiers is few enough. Setbacks like this only decrease our chances of success.
QuestData.RewardText: The abbey will fall shortly. We can soon move on, deeper into Tyr's Hand.

Objectives.Objective: Open portal within Hall of Arms
